metadata.title: CVE-2024-27316 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HTTP/2 incoming headers exceeding the limit are temporarily buffered innghttp2 in order to generate an informative HTTP 413 response. If a clientdoes not stop sending headers, this leads to memory exhaustion.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
